FolderConfiguration.comment: Specify the Paths of the SourceFolder and DestinationFolder. Optionally specify a Path for an ArchiveFolder. The files in source folder will be moved into the Archive Folder for auto-housekeeping after being successfully processed if you specify a value for this attribute. If left blank, the files in the source folder will be left inside the Source Folder after processing. Use the Absolute Folder Path that is specific to your OS e.g. Windows D: oo  vs Linux /urs/local/foo. Optionally specify file prefixes to be added to the Destination and Archive Files. Leave Blank if not required.

OperationMode.comment: Specify the ModeOfOperation: SENDER or RECIPIENT

PassphraseProtection.comment: Options for PassphraseProtectionMode: Specify either AWS_SECRETSMANAGER, WINDOWS_DPAPI or ASPNET_DPAPI. entropy is required for both WINDOWS_DPAPI & ASPNET_DPAPI. Assign a unique value for your application (Use the same value when you encrypt and decrypt the OpenPGP Private Key's SecretPassPhrases). SSLCertDistinguishedSubjectName is required for ASPNET_DPAPI. Assign a unique value for your application (Use the same value when you encrypt and decrypt the OpenPGP Private Key's SecretPassPhrases).
PassphraseProtection.entropy: CD639595-9BA7-4F10-9FE7-07852D14ADE4: Salt Is Not A Password
PassphraseProtection.SSLCertDistinguishedSubjectName: CN=Application X ASP.NET Core Data Protection Certificate

SenderConfiguration.comment: Configure Sender's OpenPGP Key. The Secret Name of the AWS Secrets is only required for AWS_SECRETSMANAGER. Encrypted Passphrase for Windows Data Protection API is required for WINDOWS_DPAPI. Encrypted Passphrase using ASP.NET Core Data Protection API is required for ASPNET_DPAPI.

RecipientConfiguration.comment: Configure Recipient's OpenPGP Key. The Secret Name of the AWS Secrets is only required for AWS_SECRETSMANAGER. Encrypted Passphrase for Windows Data Protection API is required for WINDOWS_DPAPI. Encrypted Passphrase using ASP.NET Core Data Protection API is required for ASPNET_DPAPI.
